constituent: monkey, pack of wild dogs, earthenware jar, lidded crock, soil, dirt, ground, mouth, scarf
heisigStory: This clever little monkey has captured an entire pack of wild dogs, locked them inside a lidded crock, and wrapped the whole thing up in a silk scarf to present to the dogcatcher.
koohiiStory1: The MONKEY likes to play hide and seek with the PACK of WILD DOGS by hiding in the LIDDED CROCK. But he is easy to see because the SCARF he always wears is at the base of the LIDDED CROCK.
koohiiStory2: To catch a monkey, chase him with wild dogs into a lidded crock, then tie it with a scarf.
myStory: khỉ. là con mèo mặc kimono dài
